__e: Can't you shut the damn door!
I kept yelling to him to close the damn door! But when I turned back, he was already dead.
I pounded and pounded on that damn door, cried till I couldn't no more.
I don't have to explain a damn thing -- to you or anybody else.
You're not the only one with somebody inside this damn thing.
You know, I learned from a very young age that no one owes you anything, and there ain't nobody gonna give you a damn thing.
